text.0: pour forth on us abundant wealth o pavamana with thy stream.
text.1: wherewith thou mayest find us light.
text.2: o indu swayer of the sea shaker of all things flow thou on.
text.3: bearer of wealth to us with might.
text.4: with thee for hero valiant one may we subdue our enemies.
text.5: let what is precious flow to us.
text.6: indu arouses strength the sage who strives for victory winning power.
text.8: mover of speech we robe him with our songs as he is purified.
text.9: soma the guardian of the folk.
text.10: on whose way lord of holy law most richi as he is purified.
text.11: the people all have set their hearts.
